meanings.definition: A type of unleavened bread, typically made from wheat flour and water.
meanings.sent1: The chapatti was soft and warm.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed eating the chapatti with curry.
meanings.sent3: The chapatti tried to dance in the pan.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a freshly baked chapatti.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the chapatti filled the room.

meanings.sent1: She learned how to chapatti from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: He tried to chapatti while standing on one leg.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was as strong as the bond over chapatti-making.
meanings.sent5: The family gathered around to chapatti happily.
